info.title: Doctor Appointment API
info.description: API documentation for Doctor Appointment application

post.description: Authenticate user and return JWT token
Get the currently authenticated user's information
Get a new JWT token using the current token

get.summary: Get available doctors with time slots
get.description: Returns list of doctors. When 'date' parameter is provided, includes available time slots for that specific date.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Date to check availability (YYYY-MM-DD). When provided, response includes available_slots array.

available_slots.description: Available time slots (only included when date parameter is provided)

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Date to check availability (YYYY-MM-DD). When provided, response includes available_slots array.

available_slots.description: Available time slots (only included when date parameter is provided)

get.summary: Get all appointments for a doctor
Get all appointments for a patient

post.summary: Create new appointment for a patient

get.summary: Get specific appointment for a patient
